EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Send a Email when New Case For BSP Within EDD Business Days
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW New Case Notification For BSP Within EDD Business Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thanks, we've received your enquiry
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your enquiry about parcel {!Case.ReferenceID__c}. Your reference number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
What happens next
Most late parcels arrive within 5 days of the expected delivery date. If this parcel is delivered, we'll let you know and close your enquiry.
We'll monitor this parcel until {!CASE(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), 1, "Sunday", 2, "Monday", 3, "Tuesday", 4, "Wednesday", 5, "Thursday", 6, "Friday", "Saturday")} {!DAY(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c))} {!CASE(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", "Dec")}. If it hasn't been delivered by then, we'll begin investigating. No need to submit another enquiry.
We'll keep you updated
You'll hear back from us after we review your enquiry on {!CASE(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), 1, "Sunday", 2, "Monday", 3, "Tuesday", 4, "Wednesday", 5, "Thursday", 6, "Friday", "Saturday")} {!DAY(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c))} {!CASE(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Case.HeldToOpenOn__c)), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", "Dec")} - usually within 2 business days - or if this parcel is delivered.
If you no longer need us to manage your enquiry, you can cancel it easily by closing your case.
CLOSE MY CASE
Kind regards, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
